original_title: Joseph E. Howard: America's Popular Composer
overview: Joseph E. Howard presents some of his compositions: 1, 'Goodbye My Lady Love' used in 'Showboat,' 2. 'What's the Use of Dreaming,' 3. 'Oh Gee. Be Sweet to Me Dear,' and 4. 'I Wonder Who's Kissing Her Now?'
title: Joseph E. Howard: America's Popular Composer
